About Me

Hello! I’m Isabel and I’m a data scientist at Spotify. I initially joined Spotify’s ML Engagements team (Lex Beattie speaks about ML Engagements here), and I now develop insights for our Machine Learning Platform.

Prior to working at Spotify, I interned at InsideSchools and Action Research Partners. I graduated with a B.S. in Statistics and Data Science from Yale in 2021, where I was fortunate to have my senior thesis advised by Professor Elisa Celis and Professor Issa Kohler-Hausmann. During my time at Yale I was a research assistant for projects in the STEM PERL lab with Mark Graham and the Human Nature Lab under Navin Kumar.

These days, outside of work, I like to play basketball, read, and attend Moth StorySLAMs. I’m Brooklyn bred and still based out of the best borough in NYC!

Work Experience

  • Spotify, Data Scientist, 2021 - Present
  • Spotify, Data Science Intern, 2020
  • Action Research Partners, Research Intern, 2019
  • InsideSchools: Center for New York City Affairs at The New School, Research Intern, 2018

Education

  • Yale, B.S. Statistics and Data Science, 2017-2021
